name: Kill Factory(AlphaTest)
description:
Last week i wanted to play a factory survival game in 3d.  Could not find or think of a good one.  so i made one.
Let me know what you think this is just the start many features to be added if people enjoy the concept.

AI need alot of work to get the correct feel. 

I intend on adding map levels to progress through.

Feedback welcome

https://discord.gg/f9MqfYxrhj

Next update will have 2 more levels of machines(currently 2 levels / 10 macnines)

Also more turrets to defend and possibly upgrades for the player.

Game works with the steam network on a temp key(spacewar) for testing. 

If popular i will release the game on steam for better ability to update and support the game.
